organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions "U.N.", which stands for the United Nations. The United Nations is an international organization established in 1945 to promote international cooperation and prevent conflicts. It is a valid organization entity and is presented in the same words as in the original paragraph.
